messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
My body isn’t the only thing I
work on toughening up here.I also work on my Pokémon and my
spirit!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Wow, Trainer! You just might be
tougher than our Gym Leader!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Maybe I’ll do like Wake,I mean, Crasher Wake, and wear
the same kind of mask.
